headline: Target’s New CEO Faces Protests While Betting On Beauty Growth
summary: Michael Fiddelke has stepped into the CEO role at Target (NYSE:TGT), taking charge during a period of operational pressure and shifting priorities. His first day included protests at Target’s headquarters related to controversial issues raised by some groups. Target is expanding its beauty and haircare offerings, including the launch of the inclusive "being" brand and refreshed in store experiences. For investors watching NYSE:TGT, this leadership change lands at a time when the company is...
